Articles.Content: I just started up RSS RO again after a long time and I am attempting science mode. However I'm running into a big issue from the start. When I collect science from the aerobee sounding rocket it says "data not stored, not enough space on hard drive." I even tried using a kerbal at the launch pad to collect it and it still comes up with the same problem. Any ideas on how to fix this? Or what I need to add to the rocket?
